testsuite.name: com.boeing.tdd.api.controller.PostControllerIntegrationTest

testcase.name: returnsOkStatus

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Status expected:<200 OK> but was:<500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR>
> GET http://localhost:60277/posts > WebTestClient-Request-Id: [3]
No content
< 500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR Internal Server Error < Content-Type: [application/json;charset=UTF-8] < Content-Length: [512]
{"timestamp":"2019-05-17T05:20:19.088+0000","path":"/posts","status":500,"error":"Internal Server Error","message":"Type definition error: [simple type, class com.boeing.tdd.api.entity.Post]; nested exception is com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidDefinitionException: No serializer found for class com.boeing.tdd.api.entity.Post and no properties discovered to create BeanSerializer (to avoid exception, disable SerializationFeature.FAIL_ON_EMPTY_BEANS) (through reference chain: java.util.ArrayList[0])"}
